Race.SpecificTitle: Central Fire Prot. Dist. No. 4 Prop. No. 1 of 2 -- 5 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText: Central Fire Protection District No. 4 Proposition No. 1 of 2
Race.FullText: Shall the Central Fire Protection District No. 4, Parish of East Baton Rouge, State of Louisiana ("the Fire District"), be re-authorized to levy and collect an ad valorem tax of five (5.0) mills (the "Tax") (an estimated $993,000 is reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the Tax for the entire first year, and this amount will increase if the value of property subject to taxation increases) in each calendar year on all property subject to taxation in the Fire District for a period of ten (10) years, commencing in the year 2023 to and including the year 2032, and shall the avails or proceeds of said Tax be used entirely and exclusively for salaries, employee benefits, capital improvements and/or payment of debts and/or debt service associated with capital improvements within the Fire District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Central Fire Prot. Dist. No. 4 Prop. No. 2 of 2 -- $32.00 Service Charge Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText: Central Fire Protection District No. 4 Proposition No. 2 of 2
Race.FullText: Shall the Central Fire Protection District No. 4, Parish of East Baton Rouge, State of Louisiana ("the Fire District"), be re-authorized to levy and collect a Service Charge not to exceed $32.00 per annum (an estimated $400,000 is reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the Service Charge for the entire first year, and this amount will increase if the number of properties subject to service charge increases) from the owners of each residential or commercial structure located within the Fire District in each calendar year on all such structures in the Fire District for a period of ten (10) years, commencing in the year 2022 to, and including, the year 2031, and shall the avails or proceeds of said service charge be used entirely and exclusively for the development, operation and maintenance of the fire protection facilities and for paying the costs of obtaining water for fire protection purposes, including charges for fire hydrant rentals and service?
